name: G-Max Sandblast
effect: The Ground-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Quake while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, roll 2 Dice of Damage against all foes at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user attacks by engulfing the foe in a violent sandstorm that traps all of its foes in sandy vortexes.
